item.title: CCV SalesPoint
item.description: At CCV Lab I was the mobile lead and one of the projects I worked on was SalesPoint. Functionality SalesPoint is a dynamic app which can be a “simple” payment initiation app or a full blown electronic cash register. It can run on Android and iOS devices and integrates with specific hardware (printers, terminals, etc.). The app is designed to be offline first to allow user to initiate payments in any conditions while making sure no data gets lost.
